//Free Item
malangdo,278,220,1 shop Free Zeny & Item 112,12221:10000000,552:10000,607:100000

//The Warper to Mall
malangdo,282,218,2 script Mall Warper 910,{
shop: warp "quiz_02.gat" ,337,74;
OnInit:
 waitingroom "Shopping Mall",0;
 end;
}
//The Exit
quiz_02,337,75,5 script Exit 910,{
warp "malangdo" ,279,224;
OnInit:
 waitingroom "Exit to maintown",0;
 end;
}
